name: water-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves an eevee into vaporeon, a lombre into ludicolo, a panpour into simipour, a poliwhirl into poliwrath, a shellder into cloyster, or a staryu into starmie.
short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Vaporeon, a Lombre into Ludicolo, a Panpour into Simipour, a Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, a Shellder into Cloyster, or a Staryu into Starmie.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a clear, light blue.
flavor_text.platinum: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a clear, light blue.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a clear, light blue.
